main_definition: Infants are young children or newborn babies, typically under the age of one year.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In a figurative sense referring to something very basic or undeveloped in skill or knowledge
meanings_and_examples.example: The company's infants products lack sophistication and require further development.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Refers to young children, especially those who are not yet one year old
meanings_and_examples.example: The pediatrician specializes in caring for infants at the local hospital.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In biology or zoology, referring to a very early stage of development after birth
meanings_and_examples.example: Infants are highly dependent on their caregivers and need constant attention.
